# Drag-Controls

This guide will help you get started a simple movable object in TresJS.

We will build a simple scene with one mesh.
<SandboxDemo url="https://play.tresjs.org/#" />

## Setting up the scene 
We import all the modules that we need, for this we need `DragControls` from Threejs which is not part of the core library. 
You can add it to your project by import it from the 'three/addons/controls/DragControls'

```js
import { DragControls } from 'three/addons/controls/DragControls.js'
```
